name: Taiwanese Cold Noodles
description: Authentic Taiwanese Cold Noodles. Chilled noodles tossed in a tangy, nutty sesame sauce. Cool and refreshing, perfect for a hot summer's day.
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons Taiwanese sesame paste (see notes for substitutes)

recipeInstructions.name: Make the Cold Noodles. Cook noodles according to package instructions. Drain noodles and soak in ice water while you prepare the sauce.
recipeInstructions.text: Make the Cold Noodles. Cook noodles according to package instructions. Drain noodles and soak in ice water while you prepare the sauce.

recipeInstructions.name: Make the Sauce. Simply whisk together sesame paste (or peanut butter), sesame oil, brown sugar, black vinegar, soy sauce, and water. Note: most people only regard sesame paste as traditional, but actually peanut butter is traditional too. Peanut butter is a popular choice especially in Southern Taiwan.

recipeInstructions.name: To Finish. Drain noodles from the ice bath and toss together with sauce. Top with minced garlic, sesame seeds, and thinly sliced cucumbers. Enjoy immediately.
